amendment.description: To require that the Administrator of the Coalition Provisional Authority be an officer who is appointed by the President by and with the advice and consent of the Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1969 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 414.

action.text: Amendment SA 1969 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S13235; text: CR S13235) To require that the Administrator of the Coalition Provisional Authority be an officer who is appointed by the President by and with the advice and consent of the Senate.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1969 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 414.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1969 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 414.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1969 proposed by Senator Byrd.
